title: Training Players - Novel Updates
author: Purple Or Blue
description:
The world's popular virtual game {Eternal Life} surprised most of the world at its 100% authenticity.

For his dream, Qin Zheng made a bet with his parents that if he did not achieve glory in the game, he would go back home and inherit the small company.

However, his rise to fame will quickly grow with the SSS-talent (Identity Replacement).

'The power to become an NPC!?.'>
